Trample
[i]Demon Light[/i] – Whenever Fomortiis, Demon King becomes blocked by one or more creatures, that creature's controller sacrifices a creature.
[i]Ravager[/i] – Whenever a permanent is sacrificed, Fomortiis deals 2 damage to target opponent.
[i]Nightmare[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, any player may tap four untapped creatures they control. If they do, tap Fomortiis.
